thread.title: Democrats Silently Protest Republicans’ Plans To Repeal Obamacare
thread.title_full: Democrats Silently Protest Republicans’ Plans To Repeal Obamacare

author: Fred Maxwell
title: Democrats Silently Protest Republicans’ Plans To Repeal Obamacare
text:
Here’s How President Trump’s Inaugural Address Was Like Washington’s First 
Throughout his campaign, Trump made clear his desire to see the unpopular legislation repealed. No matter what happens after today, we will never give up the fight to #ProtectOurCare and build a better future for all Americans. pic.twitter.com/fY2kNSfk6c 
— Rep. Cheri Bustos (@RepCheri) January 20, 2017 On #inaug2017 platform proudly wearing #ProtectOurCare button. The fight to keep ALL OF US healthy starts now. Count me in. pic.twitter.com/jR9o7Vy8d3 
— Rep. Eric Swalwell (@RepSwalwell) January 20, 2017 Advertisement - story continues below 
— Olivier Knox (@OKnox) January 20, 2017 
Some Republicans, including Trump, have said portions of the program will remain in place, while others want Obamacare eliminated in full. 
In anticipation of Trump’s taking office, the Senate voted 51-48 to approve a measure to pave the way for the Affordable Care Act to be dismantled. 
The House then approved the bill in a 227-198 vote. Advertisement - story continues below
